DDL.statement: CREATE VIEW view_weight_samples2 AS SELECT APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_POINT.LOCATION AS LOCATION, APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER.PRODUCT_GROUP AS PRODUCT_GROUP, APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER.SAMPLE_DATE AS SAMPLE_DATE, cast( APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER.SAMPLE_DATE AS DATE ) AS SAMPLE_DATE_SHORT, APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER.NOMINAL_WEIGHT AS NOMINAL_WEIGHT, APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER.SAMPLE_COUNT AS SAMPLE_COUNT, APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER.SAMPLE_MEAN AS SAMPLE_MEAN, APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER.SAMPLE_STD_DEV AS SAMPLE_STD_DEV, APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER.SAMPLE_T1_COUNT AS SAMPLE_T1_COUNT, APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER.SAMPLE_T2_COUNT AS SAMPLE_T2_COUNT FROM APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_DETAIL JOIN APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER ON APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_DETAIL.SAMPLE_POINT = APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER.SAMPLE_POINT AND APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_DETAIL.SAMPLE_DATE = APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER.SAMPLE_DATE JOIN APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_POINT ON APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_POINT.SAMPLE_POINT = APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER.SAMPLE_POINT
